WebSocket server URL is not configured. Real-time collaboration requires a separate WebSocket server. Basic whiteboard functionality works without it.
translations.WebSocket server shared secret is not co: WebSocket server shared secret is not configured. This is required for secure authentication between Nextcloud and the WebSocket server for real-time collaboration.
WebSocket server configuration is valid. Browser-based connection test will verify actual connectivity for real-time collaboration.
translations.The official whiteboard app for Nextclou:
The official whiteboard app for Nextcloud. It allows users to create and share whiteboards with other users and collaborate in real-time.

**Whiteboard requires a separate collaboration server to work.** Please see the [documentation](https://github.com/nextcloud/whiteboard?tab=readme-ov-file#backend) on how to install it.

- üé® Drawing shapes, writing text, connecting elements
- üìù Real-time collaboration
- üñºÔ∏è Add images with drag and drop
- üìä Easily add mermaid diagrams
- ‚ú® Use the Smart Picker to embed other elements from Nextcloud
- üì¶ Image export
- üí™ Strong foundation: We use Excalidraw as our base library
translations.WebSocket server for real-time collabora: WebSocket server for real-time collaboration is configured and connected.
translations.The WebSocket server handles real-time c: The WebSocket server handles real-time collaboration sessions between users. Basic whiteboard functionality works without it, but real-time collaboration requires this server to be running and accessible from users' browsers.
translations.See the documentation on how to install: See the documentation on how to install and configure the WebSocket server.
translations.URL where the WebSocket server for real-: URL where the WebSocket server for real-time collaboration is running. Must be accessible from users' browsers.
translations.JWT secret key shared between Nextcloud: JWT secret key shared between Nextcloud and the WebSocket server for secure authentication.
translations.Unable to connect to collaboration serve: Unable to connect to collaboration server. The JWT secret may be misconfigured. You can continue working locally, and your changes will be saved to your device.
translations.You do not have permission to access thi: You do not have permission to access this whiteboard for collaboration. You can continue working locally.
translations.Local changes are automatically saved to: Local changes are automatically saved to your device. Collaboration features will be unavailable until this issue is resolved.
translations.Start presenting to share your viewport: Start presenting to share your viewport with others
translations.%s is currently presenting. Others will: %s is currently presenting. Others will follow their viewport.
translations.Presentation requires connection to coll: Presentation requires connection to collaboration server
